sentence.text: The major categories of pancreatic neuroendocrine tumor (Pannegative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated) are well-differentiated NET and poorly differentiated neuroendocrine carcinoma.

Sequencing of these tumors has identified multiple important genes in the pathogenesis of Pannegative regulation of transcription, DNA-templateds, such as nucleosome assembly/ATRX, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, TP53, RB, and regulation of cell growth pathway genes.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Our data support that high-grade progression in Pannegative regulation of transcription, DNA-templateds may be the result of the progressive accumulation of genetic changes (CNVs and point mutational changes) within the body of the tumor.
